Radio dua
//preference Playback & Music Quality other Auto play Streaming radio
To start command say \"Okay Radio\". Say \"digits\", \"forecast\" or \"phones\" to choose the grammar, language model or phonetic decoder example. To try recognition of digits: say something like \"one two three four five\". To try recognition of a weather forecast like \"sunny spells on Wednesday\". Make control with play, pause, stop, next
Yes or No Say below text Test Speech Recognition
